trans-unit.source: More than one argument is specified for a field set operation.
trans-unit.target: 为字段 set 操作指定了多个参数。

trans-unit.source: The field or property cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到此字段或属性。

trans-unit.source: The method cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到此方法。

trans-unit.source: A private member is invoked without the necessary <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: 在没有所需 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission" /> 的情况下调用私有成员。

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying type that represents the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.IReflect" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.IReflect" /> 对象的基础类型。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Reflection.IReflect.UnderlyingSystemType" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅 <see cref="P:System.Reflection.IReflect.UnderlyingSystemType" />。

trans-unit.source: The underlying type that represents the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.IReflect" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.IReflect" /> 对象的基础类型。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Reflection.IReflect> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Reflection.IReflect> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Associates an object with an instance of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 将对象与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> 的一个实例关联起来。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> that contains the handle of the object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" />，它包含对象的句柄。

trans-unit.source: Associates an object with an instance of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> based on the handle of the object.
trans-unit.target: 根据对象的句柄，将一个对象与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> 的一个实例关联起来。

trans-unit.source: Server applications can call this function when they contain a custom UI object that is similar to a system-provided object.
trans-unit.target: 当它们包含类似于一个系统提供的对象的自定义用户界面对象时，服务器应用程序可以调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Server applications call `CreateStdAccessibleObject` and override the <xref:Accessibility.IAccessible> methods and properties as needed to match their custom object.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序调用`CreateStdAccessibleObject`，并重写<xref:Accessibility.IAccessible>方法和属性所需匹配其自定义对象。

trans-unit.source: This approach saves server developers the work of fully implementing all the <xref:Accessibility.IAccessible> properties and methods.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使服务器开发的完全实现所有的工作<xref:Accessibility.IAccessible>属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: This function is similar to `CreateStdAccessibleProxy`, except that `CreateStdAccessibleProxy` enables you to specify the class name as a parameter, whereas `CreateStdAccessibleObject` uses the class name associated with the `hwnd`.
trans-unit.target: 此函数是类似于`CreateStdAccessibleProxy`，只不过`CreateStdAccessibleProxy`可用于指定的类名称作为参数，而`CreateStdAccessibleObject`使用与关联的类名称`hwnd`。

trans-unit.source: Calling this version of the `UseStdAccessible` is the same as calling the two parameter version with an objid of CLIENT.
trans-unit.target: 调用此版本的`UseStdAccessible`与调用的两个参数版本与客户端 objid 相同。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> that contains the handle of the object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" />，它包含对象的句柄。

trans-unit.source: An Int that defines the type of object that the <c>handle</c> parameter refers to.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，它定义 <c>handle</c> 参数引用的对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: Associates an object with an instance of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> based on the handle and the object id of the object.
trans-unit.target: 根据对象的句柄和对象 ID，将一个对象与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> 的一个实例关联起来。

trans-unit.source: Creates an accessible object with the methods and properties for the specified type of system-provided user interface element.
trans-unit.target: 与方法和指定类型的系统提供的用户界面元素的属性创建的可访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: Server applications can call this function when they contain a custom UI object that is similar to a system-provided object.
trans-unit.target: 当它们包含类似于一个系统提供的对象的自定义用户界面对象时，服务器应用程序可以调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Server applications call `CreateStdAccessibleObject` and override the <xref:Accessibility.IAccessible> methods and properties as needed to match their custom object.
trans-unit.target: 服务器应用程序调用`CreateStdAccessibleObject`，并重写<xref:Accessibility.IAccessible>方法和属性所需匹配其自定义对象。

trans-unit.source: This approach saves server developers the work of fully implementing all the <xref:Accessibility.IAccessible> properties and methods.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使服务器开发的完全实现所有的工作<xref:Accessibility.IAccessible>属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: Valid `objid` values.
trans-unit.target: 有效`objid`值。

trans-unit.source: Object
trans-unit.target: 对象

trans-unit.source: Value
Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: ALERT
trans-unit.target: 警报

trans-unit.source: 0xFFFFFFF6
trans-unit.target: 0xFFFFFFF6

trans-unit.source: Refers to a message associated with a window or application.
trans-unit.target: 是指与窗口或应用程序相关联的消息。

trans-unit.source: CARET
trans-unit.target: 插入符号

trans-unit.source: 0xFFFFFFF8
trans-unit.target: 0xFFFFFFF8

trans-unit.source: Refers to the text insertion bar (caret) in the window.
trans-unit.target: 将文本插入是指在窗口栏 （插入符号）。

trans-unit.source: CLIENT
trans-unit.target: 客户端

trans-unit.source: 0xFFFFFFFC
trans-unit.target: 0xFFFFFFFC

trans-unit.source: Refers to the window's client area.
trans-unit.target: 引用的窗口的客户端区域。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the operating system controls the frame elements, and the client object contains all elements that the application controls.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，操作系统控制框架元素，并在客户端对象包含应用程序控制的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: CURSOR
trans-unit.target: 光标

trans-unit.source: 0xFFFFFFF7
trans-unit.target: 0xFFFFFFF7

trans-unit.source: Refers to the mouse pointer.
trans-unit.target: 是指鼠标指针。

trans-unit.source: There is only one mouse pointer in the system and it is not a child of a window.
trans-unit.target: 在系统中没有只有一个鼠标指针，它不是窗口的子级。

trans-unit.source: HSCROLL
trans-unit.target: HSCROLL

trans-unit.source: 0xFFFFFFFA
trans-unit.target: 0xFFFFFFFA

trans-unit.source: Refers to the window's horizontal scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 指窗口的水平滚动条。

trans-unit.source: MENU
trans-unit.target: MENU

trans-unit.source: 0xFFFFFFFD
trans-unit.target: 0xFFFFFFFD

trans-unit.source: Refers to the window's menu bar.
trans-unit.target: 指窗口的菜单栏。

trans-unit.source: SIZEGRIP
trans-unit.target: SIZEGRIP

trans-unit.source: 0xFFFFFFF9
trans-unit.target: 0xFFFFFFF9

trans-unit.source: Refers to the window's size grip, an optional frame component located at the lower right corner of the window frame.
trans-unit.target: 指窗口的大小调整手柄，位于窗口框架的右下角的可选框架组件。

trans-unit.source: SOUND
trans-unit.target: 声音

trans-unit.source: 0xFFFFFFF5
trans-unit.target: 0xFFFFFFF5

trans-unit.source: Refers to a sound object.
trans-unit.target: 指声音的对象。

trans-unit.source: Sound objects do not have screen locations or children, but do have name and state attributes.
trans-unit.target: 声音对象不具有的屏幕位置或子级，但名称和状态属性。

trans-unit.source: They are children of the application playing the sound.
trans-unit.target: 它们是应用程序播放声音的子级。

trans-unit.source: SYSMENU
trans-unit.target: SYSMENU

trans-unit.source: 0xFFFFFFFF
trans-unit.target: 0xFFFFFFFF

trans-unit.source: Refers to the window's system menu.
trans-unit.target: 指窗口的系统菜单。

trans-unit.source: TITLEBAR
trans-unit.target: 标题栏

trans-unit.source: 0xFFFFFFFE
trans-unit.target: 0xFFFFFFFE

trans-unit.source: Refers to the window's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 指窗口的标题栏。

trans-unit.source: VSCROLL
trans-unit.target: VSCROLL

trans-unit.source: 0xFFFFFFFB
trans-unit.target: 0xFFFFFFFB

trans-unit.source: Refers to the window's vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 指窗口的垂直滚动条。

trans-unit.source: WINDOW
trans-unit.target: 窗口

trans-unit.source: Refers to the window itself rather than to a child object.
trans-unit.target: 引用窗口本身，而不是子对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of an accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置辅助性对象的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of an accessible object, or <see langword="null" /> if the object has no value set.
trans-unit.target: 可访问对象的值，或如果该对象未设值，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A> property represents visual information contained by the object.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A>属性表示包含对象的可视信息。

trans-unit.source: Not all objects support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 并非所有对象都支持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A> property is used to tell the client about what visual information an object contains.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A>属性使用需要了解的可视信息对象包含有关客户端。

trans-unit.source: For example, the value for an edit control is the text it contains, but a menu item has no value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，编辑控件的值是它包含的文本，但菜单项包含任何值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A> property can provide hierarchical information in cases such as a tree view control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A>属性可以提供在如树视图控件的情况下分层信息。

trans-unit.source: Although the parent object in the tree view control does not provide information in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A> property, each item within the control has a zero-based value that represents its level within the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 尽管在树视图控件中的父对象不提供中的信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Value%2A>属性，在控件内的每项都有一个从零开始的值，表示层次结构中的其级别。

trans-unit.source: Top-level items have a value of zero, second-level items have a value of one, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 顶级项都具有值为零，第二个级别的项具有的值 1，依次类推。

trans-unit.source: The values returned from scroll bar and trackbar accessible objects indicate percentages, so they are integers between 0 and 100, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 返回的值从滚动条和跟踪条可访问对象指定百分比，以使它们为 0 和 100 之间 （含） 之间的整数。

trans-unit.source: The value cannot be set or retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 无法设置或检索值。
